creator: azndude2@gmail.com
text:
I have two aliases which are /music and /music/albums, which work well.  I have
them both be autoindexed, and when I am browsing the /music directory, the
albums directory is not in the index.

Erm, where's the "bug"?  It's unclear what you've done, but this looks like a
question more appropriate to a user support forum than to bugzilla.
creator: nick@webthing.com
